img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 75.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d9/Wukong_LowerHollow_75.jpg)
The same goes for their shared moveset of leaping forward to stab straight ahead with two talons, as she'll quickly follow the stab with a concentrated poison spray right in front of her, which you can avoid by dodging to the sides rather than rolling forward or backward.
img_below_text:
When she goes into a frenzy of stamping down all of her legs quickly, she'll do so while spewing out poison in several directions. Try to stay one step ahead of her by keeping to her right side, and watch for her final talon stab at her front to your right, sending out another plume of poison, but leaving the rest of that area exposed to a counter attack.
She also has a nasty habit of rapidly twitching her body while standing still, only to suddenly pivot and slam her rear into you at full force, which can deal a ton of damage. Even if you're at range, expect webbing strands to fly out that you need to dodge or deflect with your staff spin.

The same goes for their shared moveset of leaping forward to stab straight ahead with two talons, as she'll quickly follow the stab with a concentrated poison spray right in front of her, which you can avoid by dodging to the sides rather than rolling forward or backward."
            - Following Text: "When she goes into a frenzy of stamping down all of her legs quickly, she'll do so while spewing out poison in several directions. Try to stay one step ahead of her by keeping to her right side, and watch for her final talon stab at her front to your right, sending out another plume of poison, but leaving the rest of that area exposed to a counter attack.
She also has a nasty habit of rapidly twitching her body while standing still, only to suddenly pivot and slam her rear into you at full force, which can deal a ton of damage. Even if you're at range, expect webbing strands to fly out that you need to dodge or deflect with your staff spin."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a fierce battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring a large, menacing spider enemy known as the Violet Spider. The spider is shown in an aggressive stance, likely preparing to attack with its talons or unleash a poison spray, as described in the preceding and following text. The context suggests strategies for avoiding the spider's attacks, such as dodging to the sides and staying to its right side to counter its moves, emphasizing the tactical nature of the encounter.
